data.subject: select_folder_path_easy
data.question: What does the select_folder_path_easy extension do?
data.answer: The select_folder_path_easy extension connects nodes and specifies the output path of the generated images to a manageable path.

data.subject: select_folder_path_easy
data.question: How is select_folder_path_easy installed?
data.answer: To install select_folder_path_easy, you need to navigate to the ComfyUI directory, then custom_nodes, and clone the repository from GitHub with the command 'git clone https://github.com/Umikaze-job/select_folder_path_easy'.

data.subject: select_folder_path_easy
data.question: How is the select_folder_path_easy extension used?
data.answer: To use the select_folder_path_easy extension, right-click on the Save Image node and click on Convert filename_prefix to input, then connect the select folder path easy and Save Image nodes.

data.subject: select_folder_path_easy
data.question: How is the file name specified in select_folder_path_easy?
data.answer: In select_folder_path_easy, the file name is specified with the 'file_name' parameter. The file will be named '[file_name]_[image_id].png'.

data.subject: select_folder_path_easy
data.question: What is the 'time_format' parameter used for in select_folder_path_easy?
data.answer: The 'time_format' parameter in select_folder_path_easy is used to specify the format of the time folder.
